Thank you Slothmoss for releasing this torrent, it was fun whilst it lasted!
However, after downloading it (downloaded it a couple days ago), all was going smoothly, I was running Fiddler and that and was having fun in Minecraft Indev, only then was I stumped. I was stumped because I wanted to save my progress in Minecraft (about half an hours worth) and to see if the saving system works, as I read up on this page some people were having problems.
Well I did save it, and it was successful, and I decided to leave it for the night.
The next day I played again, loading Minecraft up like before with Fiddler etc., only to find that when I tried to click Load or Save, it said "Unable to load file", even when I tried to save... I restarted it and it happened again so I looked around and didn't find anything that could help me. When I came on today, something even worse happened, everytime I loaded up Minecraft, the cmd log was spamming like crazy with the error "java.lang.NullPointerException", and I have no idea what to do.
I've tried adding new textures and updating java but no avail...
Thanks in advance!
